programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: COWBUAAY CHAI
programme.desc: There is a harvest festival and Chai Raja expects extra business. Sundar is awed by the grand floats and dressed up cattle but what seems to be the star attraction is a cattle wrangler who dressed in fancy gear shows off his talent at lassoing. Sundar manages to cajole a lasso out of the performer but is pathetic he just ends up breaking stuff around the shop. An irate Chai Raja snatches the lasso and chucks it away warning Sundar to keep away from it. But the naughty Basha having overheard the exchange snatches up the discarded lasso. He tries a few flicks and thanks to his circus bent of character is able to master it. The thrilled Basha now sets about framing poor Sundar- he wrecks, snatches away fries and disrupts work about the shop with the lasso and Chai Raja believes its Sundar who does it. Sundar must now quickly rein the situation before he gets the proverbial boot.

programme.title: MONKEY KALARI
programme.desc: A Kalari Gurukkal does a demonstration outside the Chai shop and suddenly the hotel has a massive swell of customers jostling in. Chai Raja is thrilled at the sudden pile of customers as tea glasses and snacks fly off the counter and even the flies are shooed off their hangout for lack of space. The extra publicity is great and Chai Raja sends out a complimentary snack plate with Sundar to the Kalari Guru- Basha planning to swipe a few complimentary snacks himself follows Sundar but then stops short as he sees the high leaps and stunts of the Gurukkal suddenly Basha is extremely interested in learning the art. (Basha sees the kalari moves as a easy way to out-of reach snack shelves). He approaches the teacher, but the latter is a stern man and is not easily coaxed. Basha tries buttering up the Gurukkal- at first the lazy Sundar doesnt clue in but when he realizes that Basha plans to use the Kalari moves to chomp away the fries kept for the customers. Sundar decides (thought bubbles) to master the art himself and beat Basha before he can succeed. Now the Kalari Guru has two very-very interested/undesired disciples who are intent on learning- or not letting the other one learn- Kalari! Add to this the fact that Chai Raja is losing his cool thanks to Sundar neglecting the customers and his job for the sake of the lessons. Sundar has to dash off for a bit and Basha creates his own Kalari moves. Its no time for monkeying but will Sundar realize that before its too late?

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: SPLIT PERSONALITY
programme.desc: A fresh morning in Hotel Kelifornia sees a cheeky Basha stealing a plate full of aaloo bonda and an angry Sundar chasing him out of the shop. The chase leads them to a coconut tree and Basha starts to throw coconuts at Sundar. One of the coconuts misses the target and bounces back hitting Basha on his head. The next moment Bashas whole attitude changes and he becomes a meek and obedient slave to Sundar. Sundar is inexplicably delighted at the exciting turn of events and he put Basha to hard labour in the shop. He is serving, cleaning, pressing Sundars legs, fanning for him and so on. Now Sundar is enjoying his life. But he still has to act all hard working in front of Chai Raja. During one of such charades a steel tumbler falls on Bashas head bringing him back to his real self. An unaware Sundar bosses around soon realizing that his good times have ended. Basha sees so much cleaning and rearranging done in the shop and he himself is too tired. Putting two and two together, it is payback time. And Sundar pays everything back..with interest.

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: Water, Water Every Where
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: I Love My Family the Most
programme.desc: A boy who likes to swim falls into the sea and sinks. There are many delicious foods in the fairy castle in the sea that saved the boy, but the boy misses his family on land.

programme.title: Love in the World
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: All Aboard
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Low Memory
programme.desc: Sneevil gets amnesia and the Smighties take him on a camping adventure. They have a great time with him until he gets his memory back!

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Valeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: Nardilicious
programme.desc: Its the annual Cake Festival and the Villains have tampered with Nardys famous recipe, causing the Super Sixs heads to swell and get stuck together. Can they figure out how to use their powers together to stop Sneevil from stealing the Smighty Stones?

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: NO BANANAS!!
programme.desc: Chai Raja in all gusto, pulls open his pantry and finds that he is out of bananas- now how will he make fries?! Oops! Quickly putting Sundar in charge, Chai Raja hops on his rusty cycle and heads off for fresh stock. Meanwhile, Sundar sees the customers line up and for the sake of Chai Raja wants to somehow keep them happy. Sundar sees Basha snacking on his private banana reserve and sprinting over strikes a deal with Basha- give me your bananas for now, and I will let you snack. Basha, after a moments thought agrees and the deal is struck. As Basha in an odd moment of generosity, entertains the customers, Sundar frantically hashes up fritters- but when Basha shows up for his share, Sundarsidelines him and serves the customers. When this happens more than twice, Basha loses his nice-guy face and decides to set things straight. The customers find their plates vanishing and their teas arriving in curious ways. Sundar tries to iron things out, but Basha is in a frenzy. Soon when Chai Raja arrives triumphantly hoisting fresh bananas, he is literally stampeded by the fleeing customers. Sundar stands sheepish as not far away Basha chuckles holding a pile of banana fritters. He bites into one and chews...but then in disgust spits it out; after all Sundar cant cook like Chai Raja. Shrugging, Basha digs out his special reserve banana and chews on it philosophically.

programme.title: MAKEOVER
programme.desc: On the anniversary, Chai Raja wants the interior to be swankier and hires a painter to do his forefathers portrait (looks a lot like him)- only the painter is a free-loader who paints less and swipes snacks more- and he is even shiftier than Basha. Sundar quickly notices the painters nicking habits, but cant convince Chai Raja of the same. Basha, on the other hand finds himself up against someone who is craftier than Sundar. Sundar and Basha in their own ways try to bring the thieving painter to book (while Sundar tries to amp up the portrait as well) and succeed in ousting the crook, though much cant be said of Chai Rajas portrait ... in the end it looks more like Sundars forefather than Chai Rajas.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: SMART YOGURT
programme.desc: Niya unwittingly falls for Durian Grey’s latest ploy; Dojo infiltrating yoghurt chumplings.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: I Love My Family the Most
programme.desc: A boy who likes to swim falls into the sea and sinks. There are many delicious foods in the fairy castle in the sea that saved the boy, but the boy misses his family on land.

programme.title: Prima donna
programme.desc: The twins help a girl become a movie star, but she becomes a primadonna.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: Bird House
programme.desc: Dunky has just finished making a nice bird house for the new pigeon family and their new babies. The new family is grateful and Keet is their chosen godmother.

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: Much ado about poo
programme.desc: YOYO visit a park for dogs that is ruined by pooches fouling on the grass which their owners cant be bothered to clear up

programme.title: Slow down in tempo town
programme.desc: The twins are in a city where everyone lives in a frantic manner. They run fast from here and there, talking so fast that you do not understand anything. They must find a way to re-establish in the city a liveable rhythm

programme.title: The Fly.
programme.desc: A pesky fly won’t leave Gummy alone, and ends up driving him increasingly nuts in his escalating obsession to get rid of it.

programme.title: What Goes Up…
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting a party for all of Abra-Dabra and is granting Deedee the honour of inviting everyone to assemble at 12 o’clock sharp. But with Tiggy having prepared all the delectable dishes and only one hour to get them to the venue and Deedee rushing to invite everybody; Deedee decides to use some magic for the timebeing. On sprinkling some of her ‘light as air’ magic powder on the plates and Nino stringing them together as the master knots-man he is, Tiggy is able to walk them over to town-hall like a bunch of balloons. Deedee and Nino get to invite Charlie and the twins just when Boris misfires his new fishing dart gun onto Uncle Charlie causing him to fall out of his hammock. The Doobydoos and Mewmew are playing together by trying to find which group can make the tallest team-tower, just when Deedee and Nino invites them for the party. Back at town-hall Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy create a floating food game, but Tiggy reminds the Mayor that he isn’t good at tying knots. When the guests arrive, Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy usher them in and tell them how to play the game, but discover that all the strings have loosened themselves and are floating high up near the ceiling. Deedee improvises and gets the twins to use their toy dart guns to pull the food-laden plates to themselves. The Doobydoos along with Mewmew make really tall team-towers and pull their jelly plates to themselves with glee. Nino pulls down a plate that happens to be a bowl of custard. Nino gets drenched in custard, but in a very delicious way.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Treehouse Dreams
programme.desc: Odessa designs her own treehouse, but obstacles like no tree get in her way. With a little inspiration from the Zoonicorns, she still finds a way to make her dreams come true. Odessa learns to deal with setbacks in a positive way by being creative and rethinking things, then having the persistence to follow through.

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: XIA’S BAD DREAM
programme.desc: Xia becomes over-confident after he pulls off an impossible move invented by the Elders. But in his dreams, he keeps losing to mutants! April and Xia have to go into his nightmare and give him advice to conquer his dream enemies.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon - Saitn George’s Legend
programme.desc: SANDRA visits her UNCLE TONY at the old funfair where he works and is shocked to hear that it is about to shut down, because of falling visitor numbers. When she is on the ghost train, she is visited by her assistant FO, who has come to get her for a new case in the “Land of Fairytales”. On this occasion, SANDRA and FO travel into the legend of “Saint George and the Dragon”, where they face a very singular DRAGON.

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: A Mail Carrier for a day
programme.desc: Pelly, the postman, hurt his leg landing. Duda offers to help him deliver the rest of his mail. Before leaving, Pelly makes him promise to deliver a particular important letter and gives him specific instructions. Soon, Duda meets Dada and she helps him deliver the mail to Pinkar. When Duda sees everyone getting excited about his letters and packages, he starts to feel neglected and left out. The sun is setting, but Duda has one last letter to deliver, the important one. Surprisingly, Pellys instructions lead him to his house. Duda opens the letter to find an invitation to a party at the lake. But its not just any party. Its a very special party... just for Duda.

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Moon Charmer
programme.desc: Samir the local snake charmer is trying unsuccessfully to charm a snake out of his basket and the market is growing restless until Jamillah arrives and all of the market is in awe! When she explains where she comes from Samir is thrilled and asks her to accompany him to see a rare astrological site, a blood moon. But its a sight best seen from above and the greatest viewing spots are outside the city gates which are locked at night not to mention the law expressly forbidding anyone to leave. When they try to leave via a secret door a guard catches them, but just when all hope seems lost Jamillah has an idea - the magic carpet! And with that they take off into a night sky filled with a big red moon.

programme.title: Surprise Day Off
programme.desc: When all the teachers at school are mysteriously absent one day, Fred initially cheerleads his classmates to celebrate. Brains figures out they have been taken away by the potato-brained Potatoids, and she and Fred go off to rescue them.

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: Mouse Trap
programme.desc: Fred and Sir Percival are swapping practical jokes against each other. When Fred meets a hyper-intelligent mouse that Brains has, he “borrows” him to pull one last great prank. When the mouse goes missing, Brains informs them that no one else can defend them against the beastly Elephantoids!

programme.title: Even More Difficult – The Beauty & The Best
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of Beauty and the Beast, having been called out by BEAUTY. The BEAST has mysteriously disappeared, just when she had come to love him. The Detective and her assistant must find him before the magic rose in the garden loses its last petal.

programme.title: Fruits Of The Forest – Little Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Detective Sandra and her assistant Fo go to the tale of Little Red Riding Hood, having been called out by the Grandmother, whose knitting needles have mysteriously gone missing. Shortly after they arrive, and without Sandra realising it, the Wolf captures Fo and takes him to his lair in order to devour him. While Fo desperately uses his ingenuity - and a cookery book – to avoid becoming the wolf’s dinner, Sandra gets down to work in search of the knitting needles. The investigation will lead the detective to the Wolf’s lair, and thus she saves Fo. Sandra will also discover that Little Red Riding Hood and the Wolf have reached an agreement to hide the knitting needles, because Little Red Riding Hood is sick of wearing the red hoods her grandmother knits for her.

programme.title: A Prodigious Nose_Based On Pinocchio
programme.desc: On this occasion, the fairytale detective SANDRA travels to the popular tale of Pinocchio, to help poor, distraught GEPPETTO. His son has once again turned into a lifeless puppet that not even the Blue Fairy can bring back to life. SANDRA and her assistant, FO, after discovering that the puppet in GEPPETTO’s house is simply an imitation, face a difficult investigation and end up discovering that the culprit is, once again, the evil STROMBOLI. This puppet master is using the innocent PINOCCHIO to commit one robbery after another, thanks to his astonishing growing nose.

programme.title: Lazos de sangre
programme.desc: A Tatiana le diagnostican leucemia. Ella necesita un trasplante y así se entera de que es adoptada.

programme.title: Lazos de sangre
programme.desc: A Tatiana le diagnostican leucemia. Ella necesita un trasplante y así se entera de que es adoptada.

programme.title: En busca de la felicidad
programme.desc: Tres mujeres pierden todo por un estafador matrimonial que les hizo vender sus casas y ahora buscan venganza.

programme.title: En busca de la felicidad
programme.desc: Tres mujeres pierden todo por un estafador matrimonial que les hizo vender sus casas y ahora buscan venganza.

programme.title: En busca de la felicidad
programme.desc: Tres mujeres pierden todo por un estafador matrimonial que les hizo vender sus casas y ahora buscan venganza.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Outside The Box
programme.desc: A talk show tackling major news topics Al Arabiya-style.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Sports News
programme.desc: Satisfying the needs of sports enthusiasts, Al Arabiya features specialized sports programs which aim to provide in-depth news and analysis on regional and international events.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp- 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: spooking about africa 2 (1080)
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command

programme.desc: Pudgy and the Lost Kitten

programme.title: In the Bag-1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry crash their plane in the cartoon wild, wild west. Surreal hi-jinx involving a vicious outlaw and robbery ensue.

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and The Butterflies -1935
programme.desc: Molly Moo-Cow and The Butterflies

programme.title: Wild Wife 1954
programme.desc: A harried housewife describes to her boorish husband what she did that day.

programme.title: The Song of the Birds-1935
programme.desc: The Song of the Birds-1935

programme.title: The Draft Horse 1942
programme.desc: A farm horse tries to enlist in the army, but despite his virtuoso display of wartime histrionics, he's rejected when he flunks the physical. Dejected, he wanders into a mock battlefield, which tells him what war is really like.

programme.title: Gold Rush Daze 1939
programme.desc: A man stops for gas on his way to dig for gold. The man at the station tells him what it was like back in 1849 in San Francisco, which we see. A sucker is hauled off the street and sat down at a card game; he dashes off as soon as someone shouts "they found gold in the hills" but others stake claims before he can. He ends up chopping off a cliff, falling down, and landing in the hospital. The doctor gives him news of another gold strike and he rushes out to begin panning. After some more mining gags and a song, we see a montage of more failed gold strikes. Back to the present day, where the storyteller claims to have sworn off gold, until a rider passes through with news of another strike, when he trades the station for the car and sets out after the gold.

programme.title: Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: Private eye popeye (1080)
programme.desc: Private Eye Popeye gets a call from Olive Oyl to guard a precious gem. But no sooner does he get the gem than the butler takes it (and Olive). The rest of the cartoon is spent chasing the crook to Paris, the Swiss Alps, and North Africa; Popeye always gets there first, but fails to make the arrest until he lucks into some spinach, of course

programme.title: Tokyo Woes-1945
programme.desc: When Tokyo Rose begins spewing her anti-American propaganda over the airwaves, Seaman Hook is inspired to fight back, using War Bonds as literal weapons against her.

programme.title: Aladdin(Mel-O-Toons) 1960
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Arabian Nights tale, poor Aladdin discovers a magic lamp containing a genie who grants his wish to marry a princess.

programme.title: Small Fry-1939
programme.desc: Junior wants to be a Big Fry, but learns the hard way that he just isn't ready for smoking in the pool room when he should be in the school room.

programme.title: Felix in the Bone Age-1922
programme.desc: Felix comes upon a caveman and his girlfriend. The girlfriend is crying, and when the caveman asks her what she wants, she points to Felix. The caveman chases Felix, who escapes by using the tails of some friendly monkeys to make his way down a steep cliff. Later he makes friends with a baby monkey, but winds up getting in a fight with a huge gorilla.

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Training Pigeons 1936
programme.desc: Betty Boop is training a flock of pigeons, but one stray leads Pudgy the pup on a precarious chase over the rooftops.

programme.title: Floor Flusher 1954
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto stop by to see Olive and fix her leaky faucet. Popeye does it better, and Bluto gets jealous, so he starts rerouting Olive's plumbing and causing all sorts of leaks. Popeye needs some help from the goldfish to get to his spinach

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963; Season 3; Episode 27;Barney's First Car
programme.desc: It's a red-letter day in Mayberry when Barney decides to join the motoring world, but things go sour when his cream-puff turns out to be a lemon.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963; Season 3; Episode 3;Mountain Wedding
programme.desc: The Darlings ask Andy to help them deal with wild mountain man Ernest T. Bass, who wants the already-married Charlene Darling/Wash for himself.

programme.title: Between Showers-1914
programme.desc: Charlie and another man compete in trying to help a young lady cross a muddy street. The rival finds a wooden plank which Charlie takes from him. They fight over an umbrella belonging to the rival. A policeman settles the dispute, ultimately arresting the rival. An innocent tramp is pushed into the lake

programme.title: The Amazing Adventure-1936
programme.desc: A bored millionaire wagers his doctor that he can support himself at a working class job for year without touching his inheritance.

programme.title: The Lucy Show; Season 5; Episode 1; Lucy with George Burns
programme.desc: When visiting the bank as a customer, George Burns finds out that Lucy is instinctively funny and asks her to become a partner in his show. Mr. Mooney, who thinks this is an opportunity to get rid of her, accepts being her agent. The show opens in Santa Monica, where the new pair appear in a Burns and Allen-style act. George Burns is the straight man and Lucy the comedienne, who delivers the punchlines

programme.title: Yes, Yes, Nanette 1925
programme.desc: Nanette sends a letter to her family telling of her new husband, Hillory. When Hillory arrives to meet the family, he gets insulted by each member, including the dog, and loses his wig. After having dinner with the family, Nanette's former lover returns, and Hillory must confront him.

programme.title: The Greeks Had a Word for Them-1932
programme.desc: In this sophisticated comedy Jazz Age comedy, a trio of money-hungry women all have sugar daddies who keep them in the lap of luxury, even as they drive the men crazy. Each woman represents a different personality type, from sensitive, to kind-hearted, to difficult and untrustworthy. The twenties come roaring back with immorality and in-fighting

programme.title: Rio Rattler-1935
programme.desc: A dying Marshal gives Tom his identification papers to Tom. After Tom arrives in town, the papers drop and are found during a fight, so Tom decides to assume the Marshal's identity. Chief Mason now sends Rattler, the Marshal's killer, to follow up by killing Tom. But when he overhears that Tom is a fake, they change their plans and go to arrest Tom for Marshal's murder

programme.title: Roarin Guns-1936
programme.desc: Evans and Walton have started a range war causing rancher Morgan to send for the reputed killer Tim Corwin. Walton then frames Tim for the murder of Morgan. When Tim escapes the Sheriff, Evans and Walton set Tim up to be murdered. But Morgan's son Buddy overhears their plans and rides to warn Tim

programme.title: The Rider of the Law 1935
programme.desc: Bob Marlow is sent undercover to an Arizona town where an outlaw gang, comprised of the six Tolliver brothers, have taken over the town and terrorizing the citizens. He comes to town, posing as an Eastern dude, and, through a series of incidents manages to get rid of three of the brothers, mostly through their own ineptness. The remaining brothers decide to get-while-the-gettin'-is good, rob the bank and head for the Mexican border. But Bob isn't far behind

programme.title: The Singing Cowgirl 1938
programme.desc: Dorothy Page saddles up as The Singing Cowgirl, bringing her golden voice and fearless spirit to the frontier! When rustlers and schemers threaten her family’s ranch, she fights back with courage, charm, and a song in her heart. Packed with action, romance, and toe-tapping tunes, this Western delivers a fresh twist on cowboy adventure.

programme.title: There's a Noose Waiting for You
programme.desc: This sequel to the popular spaghetti western "Clint the Stranger" was released four years after the success of the first film and essentially uses the same plot. George Martin returns as Clint (renamed Trinity in some countries), an ex-gunslinger desperately wanting to be forgiven and accepted by his family that he abandoned years earlier. One major differences in the plot when compared to the first film is the addition of Klaus Kinski as a ruthless bounty hunter. The bounty hunter tracks Clint down and forces him to return to his violent ways to protect himself and his family.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: In this episode, Dave and BG chat with Darren Joffrey of Principal Cigars, discussing the unique concept behind his "Boy Band Volume One" cigar project, where five master blenders created cigars inspired by Nina Simone's album "I Put a Spell on You". Darren explains Principal Cigars' philosophy of focusing on flavor and "mechanics" (burn, smoke output, temperature) rather than just flavor, emphasizing that every cigar is weighed individually to ensure consistency. They also delve into the brand's commitment to constantly evolving blends with new tobacco discoveries and the importance of open communication with consumers, distinguishing them from traditional cigar marketing.

programme.title: Guest Commissioner Michael Cox
programme.desc: As the International Association of Chiefs of Police hit Boston this week we are resharing our conversation with Commissioner Michael Cox of the city of Boston where he discusses his 30-year career with the Boston Police Department and the challenges he faced as a person of color in law enforcement. He highlights the importance of representation and leadership in creating positive change within police departments. The conversation also touches on the Charles Stewart case in 1989 and its impact on the department's practices towards communities of color. Commissioner Cox emphasizes the need for accountability, cultural change, and addressing systemic issues within law enforcement. In this conversation, Commissioner Michael Cox discusses the importance of diversity and representation in law enforcement. He emphasizes the need for leaders who reflect the communities they serve and the value of listening to the concerns and experiences of marginalized communities. Commissioner Cox also talks about the role of body-worn cameras in promoting accountability and building trust between the police and the public. He highlights the importance of professionalism and the duty to render aid in law enforcement. Finally, he shares his hopes for the future of policing and the legacy he wants to leave.

programme.desc: Fitness queen Audrey Dunham reveals the secret to idea weight and fitness.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Party Dish: Italian Peppers
programme.desc: Elysabeth Alfano, makes Italian Stuffed Peppers and shares her secret mock-meat recipe! Reality star, Billie Lee, makes Tomato Basil Soup and a Vegan Grilled Cheese Sandwich

programme.title: Redfoo's Party Farmhouse- Short film
programme.desc: Enter the California kitchen of LMFAO's Redfoo & his partner Jazzy! Watch them create magical food!

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Planting Roots
programme.desc: From garden to gourmet, join Cayley & Brandon Jenner as they unleash flavors of plant-based cooking.

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Butternut & Blessings
programme.desc: Velvety butternut squash soup meets the crispiest vegan grilled cheese you've ever seen.

programme.title: Plant-Based by Nafsika - Parties & Pizza... All Plant-Based
programme.desc: Nafsika interviews Demetrius Bagley of New York City's Vegan EatUP and a dynamic, young vegan chef.

programme.title: Plant-Based by Nafsika - What Is Happy Cow?
programme.desc: Happy Cow, UnchainedTV's Jane Velez-Mitchell, That Snarky Vegan Girl & Bad Ass Vegan John Lewis.

programme.title: Angel
programme.desc: After his daughter goes missing, a wealthy contractor hires a group of investigative journalists to probe into an abandoned town with hope of uncovering clues about her disappearance...

programme.title: Early Grave
programme.desc: On the eve of their ten year high school reunion, six people are summoned to the isolated country estate of one of their former friends, now a famous horror writer. Once there, separated by guilt, yet bound together by a terrible secret, seven adults try to reconnect with each other, and take stock of their lives. Outside, the storm clouds gather. Rain, lightning and wind isolate the house by washing out the road and knocking down the power lines. And then, they begin to be brutally murdered one by one. Someone is out there in the wind and the rain, someone who has waited for ten years to wreak a terrible vengeance on this group. Seven friends find themselves in a struggle to survive and outwit a diabolical killer who is savagely committed to sending them all to an EARLY GRAVE...

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a mysterious crash and uncovers more than an object, but a massive government conspiracy. Inspired by the real life events of December 9, 1965 and one of America's most mysterious UFO incidents...

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: El Culto de Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: Un grupo de adolescentes con problemas y su maestra deben luchar por sobrevivir después de descubrir que una secta ha devuelto la vida a Humpty Dumpty, un muñeco asesino, y lo ha liberado en el campamento en el que se encuentran...

programme.title: El Bosque del Diablo
programme.desc: Rachel y su equipo de cineastas viajan a Transilvania, Rumania, para documentar los fenómenos paranormales en el bosque de Hoia-Baciu...

programme.title: Mi Sangriento Cumpleaños
programme.desc: Tras un terrible trauma en su cumpleaños, Emma decide no volver a celebrarlo. Pero al cumplir 21, una amiga rompe el ritual con una fiesta sorpresa, sin percatarse del despertar de los horrores que durante años han estado acechando en la oscuridad...

programme.title: Calvario "El Bien y El Mal"
programme.desc: En esta vida hay dos modos de vivir, el del bien y el del mal, paralelo y horizontal, esta historia llena de drama, acción y suspenso nos lleva a estos dos lados casi siempre elegimos voluntariamente pero en un conflicto entre la vida y la muerte y por salvar la vida llegas a traicionar a tu mejor amigo sin saber que la vida da vueltas.

programme.title: El Equipo Del Diablo
programme.desc: En una ciudad que queda en la frontera de México y los Estados Unidos hay una batalla entre los narcos El 8 y el Z4 que controlan todo el territorio, pero hay un comando especial de mercenarios que trabajan para su propia cuenta se llaman "El Equipo del Diablo" y su líder es el malvado Diablo. Cuando el gobierno quiere parar lo que esta pasando mandan al agente Ortiz para poner orden, pero como siempre cuando se trata de sicarios, ejercito, y narco.. Solamente el pueblo sale dañado.

programme.title: ¿Quieres Ser Mi Rehén?
programme.desc: Ulises, un diseñador publicitario, es tomado como rehén por una hermosa y misteriosa mujer en el día más importante de su vida y en su propia oficina. Al mismo tiempo, la exesposa de Ulises acude a su oficina y complica todavía más la situación.

programme.title: Vidas Violentas
programme.desc: integrada por seis cortometrajes escritos y dirigidos por seis de los más connotados directores mexicanos, la película fue realizada y dirigida para concientizar y reducir la violencia de género, el acoso escolar en las escuelas y la violencia doméstica. Proviene de una iniciativa del gobierno en el marco de la campaña basta no violencia

programme.title: ¡Ni Te Me Acerques!
programme.desc: Él solo tenía que cuidar el hotel y teclear su novela, como Jack Nicholson en “El Resplandor”, pero de buen rollo. Y Llega la cuarentena y se queda le pilla en el Hotel Balneario de Ariño haciendo frente a la paranoia general, el acoso de las fuerzas del orden, las videollamadas de su novia, su madre y del conspiranoico Javi... Todos nos aburrimos mucho en el primer confinamiento. Juan no.

programme.title: El Mariachi Gringo
programme.desc: Comedia romántica sobre un joven de la América profunda que -tras tener como improvisado maestro de guitarra a un emigrante- viaja a México huyendo de su vida tediosa y de su familia, para ejercitarse como mariachi.

programme.title: Entre Brujas y Nahuales
programme.desc: En la ciudad de Tulancingo Hidalgo, Acatlán y San Dionicio la gente anda muy asustada, pues se rumora que están ocurriendo sucesos fuera de lo normal, tal como desaparición de niños de quienes se han encontrado cuerpos sin sangre, dicen que son las brujas, porque han visto bolas de fuego que aparecen y desaparecen, pero nadie sabe la verdad lo que esta pasando y existe mucho miedo en la población de la región.

programme.title: El Juego del Sexo
programme.desc: Un alienígena cambiante procedente del espacio exterior causa estragos en un pequeño pueblo rural del suroeste de Estados Unidos, cerca del legendario Área 51 de fama ovni. Estos extraterrestres son una raza devoradora de cerebros a quienes les encanta decapitar y comerse a los humanos. Están entre nosotros y lo han estado durante millones de años.

programme.title: El Duende
programme.desc: Rosalía se muda a la ciudad junto a su hijo pequeño, Ramiro. Con la ayuda de una conocida, consigue encontrar vivienda. La casa ha estado cerrada por décadas, y tiene un horno antiguo. Lo que Rosalía ignora es que dentro del horno habita un duende que tiene por costumbre robar niños.
